query:
-- Create veterinarians table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS veterinarians (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  clinic_name VARCHAR(255),
  license_number VARCHAR(100),
  verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create extension_agents table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS extension_agents (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  office_location VARCHAR(255),
  certification VARCHAR(100),
  verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create prescriptions table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prescriptions (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  vet_id VARCHAR(50),
  farm_id VARCHAR(50),
  animal_id VARCHAR(50),
  medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  frequency VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  duration VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create appointments table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appointments (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  vet_id VARCHAR(50),
  farm_id VARCHAR(50),
  animal_id VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
  consultation_type VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create telemedicine_sessions table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS telemedicine_sessions (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id VARCHAR(50),
  vet_id VARCHAR(50),
  farm_id VARCHAR(50),
  meeting_link VARCHAR(500),
  platform VARCHAR(100),
  start_time DATETIME,
  end_time DATETIME,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'scheduled',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES appointments(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create calendar_syncs table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS calendar_syncs (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  vet_id VARCHAR(50),
  calendar_provider VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  access_token VARCHAR(500),
  sync_frequency VARCHAR(50),
  last_sync DATETIME,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create notification_preferences table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_preferences (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_reminders BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  prescription_alerts BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  health_alerts BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  training_notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  reminder_timing VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '24_hours_before',
  preferred_channel VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sms',
  quiet_hours_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  quiet_hours_start TIME DEFAULT '20:00:00',
  quiet_hours_end TIME DEFAULT '08:00:00',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create notification_logs table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_logs (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(50),
  notification_type VARCHAR(100),
  recipient_phone VARCHAR(20),
  recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
  message_content TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sent',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create appointments table

  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,

  animal_id VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,

-- Create telemedicine_sessions table

  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id VARCHAR(50),

  start_time DATETIME,

  FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES appointments(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create calendar_syncs table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS calendar_syncs (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  vet_id VARCHAR(50),
  calendar_provider VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  access_token VARCHAR(500),
  sync_frequency VARCHAR(50),
  last_sync DATETIME,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (vet_id) REFERENCES veterinarians(id)
);

-- Create notification_preferences table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_preferences (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_reminders BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  prescription_alerts BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  health_alerts BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  training_notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  reminder_timing VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '24_hours_before',
  preferred_channel VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sms',
  quiet_hours_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  quiet_hours_start TIME DEFAULT '20:00:00',
  quiet_hours_end TIME DEFAULT '08:00:00',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

-- Create notification_logs table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_logs (
  id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(50),
  notification_type VARCHAR(100),
  recipient_phone VARCHAR(20),
  recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
  message_content TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sent',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
